Polda Metro Jaya Terima Laporan Kader PDIP Atas Novel Baswedan
06 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya menerima laporan kader PDI Perjuangan Dewi Tanjung atas penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan. Laporan atas dugaan rekayasa dalam kasus penyiraman air keras ke mata Novel pada April 2017 lalu itu diterima dengan nomor LP 7171/XI/2019/PMJ/Dit Krimsus.
"Iya ini diterima," kata Dewi usai membuat laporan di Polda Metro Jaya, Rabu 6 November 2019.
Dalam surat laporan tersebut Novel dilaporkan melanggar Pasal 26 ayat (2) junto Pasal 45 A Ayat (2) Undang-Undang nomor 19 tahun 2016 tentang Informasi dan Transaksi Elektronik dan atau Pasal 14 A ayat 1 UU RI nomor 1 tahun 1946 tentang Peraturan Hukum Pidana.
Dewi menilai kasus penyiraman air keras yang dialami Novel Baswedan merupakan rekayasa. Dia menyatakan bahwa efek air keras seharusnya tak hanya merusak bagian mata Novel, namun merusak hingga bagian pipi.
Dewi juga menilai ada kejanggalan dari video-video yang memperlihatkan kondisi Novel, termasuk salah satu video Novel dengan kedaan mata tidak rusak yang viral di sosial media.
Dewi mengaku sudah membawa sejumlah barang bukti atas laporannya tersebut. Namun Dewi enggan menjelaskan lebih jauh. "Ada barang bukti foto-foto, video,"ujarnya.
Berita tudingan rekayasa kasus penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel Baswedan mencuat di sosial media beberpa hari lalu dari sebuah tayangan video Novel sedang duduk sambil didorong di kursi roda
Pengunggah video itu menyertakan keterangan tertulis, "Mata Novel Baswedan saat baru ditayangin di NET TV 18 april 2017..!?dia kaget dg tiba2 kemunculan wartawan NET, liat matanya dan pipi mulus pdhl baru kasus penyiraman," tulisnya.
Dari video itu, sejumlah pemilik akun media sosial di Twitter lantas menuduh adanya rekayasa dalam penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel. Akun-akun itu mencuit dengan narasi soal adanya skenario di kasus tersebut.
Novel sendiri telah menanggapi serangan kepadanya di media sosial twitter. Dia menyatakan sempat mengalami luka bakar di bagian wajahnya saat awal peristiwa penyiraman air keras tersebut. Namun luka tersebut pulih hanya dalam waktu 5 hari saja setelah ditangani dokter ahli di Singapura.
"Di Singapore kebetulan bagus dan Alhamdulillah atas izin Allah bisa kembali hanya sedikit sekali yang tersisa. Hanya luka permukaan. Jadi semua tumbuh sendiri yang di muka. Saya lihat ke kaca juga enggak nampak, cuma dilihat sama orang yang dampingi," ujarnya.

Polda Metro Jaya Receives PDIP Cadre Report on Baswedan Novel
06 Nov 2019, 12:24 by Taufiq Siddiq, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya received PDI Perjuangan cadre reports on senior investigators at Novel Baswedan Corruption Eradication Commission. The report on the alleged engineering in the case of splashing hard water into Novel's eyes in April 2017 was received with number LP 7171 / XI / 2019 / PMJ / Dit Crimsus.
"Yes, this was accepted," Dewi said after making a report at the Jakarta Police, Wednesday 6 November 2019.
In the report letter the Novel reportedly violated Article 26 paragraph (2) of the junto Article 45 A Paragraph (2) of Law number 19 of 2016 concerning Electronic Information and Transactions and or Article 14 A paragraph 1 of RI Law number 1 of 1946 concerning Criminal Law Regulations .
Dewi assessed that the case of the hard watering experienced by Novel Baswedan was fabricated. He stated that the effect of hard water should not only damage the Novel's eyes, but damage to the cheeks.
Dewi also assessed that there were irregularities in the videos that showed the condition of the novel, including one of the novel videos with the appearance of an undamaged eye that was viral on social media.
Dewi claimed to have brought a number of items of evidence to the report. But Dewi was reluctant to explain further. "There is evidence of photographs, videos," he said.
News of allegations of engineering a case of hard water sprinkling on Baswedan novel sticking out on social media a few days ago from a video show Novel was sitting while being pushed in a wheelchair
The uploader of the video included a written statement, "Baswedan's novel eye when it was just aired on NET TV on April 18, 2017 ...!? He was shocked by the sudden appearance of NET reporters, looking his eyes and cheeks smoothly in a new watering case," he wrote.
From the video, a number of social media account owners on Twitter then accused the engineered watering of the novel. The accounts tweeted with narration about the scenario in the case.
The novel itself has responded to the attack on him on Twitter social media. He stated that he had suffered burns on his face during the beginning of the hard watering event. But the wound healed in just 5 days after being treated by a specialist in Singapore.
"In Singapore it was a good coincidence and Alhamdulillah with Allah's permission, only a very few were left. Only surface wounds. So everything grew on its own face. I saw the glass also not visible, only seen by the person being accompanied," he said.
